relation: Campus safety is a must have at any university and Charleston Southern does a fine job of making students feel safe in their new home away from home.
There are plenty of attractions near Charleston Southern from the downtown area to the beach we've got it as well as fun eateries to enjoy with family and friends
The cafe and the dinning hall are the hot spots at Charleston Southern were students can enjoy a variety of wholesome dishes.
Dorm life is a great way to build life long friendship and faithful bonds.

Academically Charleston Southern strives for students to go beyond excellence and while grades aren't the label of a man's worth we still take pride in learning and understanding what God has created. By understanding we hope to create or rather equip leaders to integrate their faith through their career goals.

I you feel like you need to be a Christian to be a part of Charleston Southern your wrong, there is no pressure. If you are all ready a Christian Charleston Southern is a wonderful place that can help you grow as a believer as you search for God's calling for your life.Christian or not just be aware of the cultural diversities that arrive on campus. Don't be to quick to judge those before you get to meet them, but embrace individuality and diversity.

Charleston Southern is a cozy little campus with a lovey christian family. The atmosphere is Christ centered as we continue to seek his kingdom.Here we embrace the various attributes that God has placed in us and love on everyone whether or not they believe.

textAfterTable: It's not the cheapest school, but the experience has definitely been worth it! Am enjoying being here I love everything about my experience at CSU. Absolutely no complaints! Am learning a lot Great faculty and diversity in course selection. Login to rate or flag the reviews Nikki Watson 02/14/2012 Reviewer is A past student here. 11 out of 16 people found this review useful. 4 people found this inaccurate. 3 of 47 Categories Comments Campus Safety just read what i said above. i had to leave for safety issues. i dont really care if people rate my comments badly. this is seriously for the people who really want to know what this college is like.
